name: ios-tap-benefitpay-sdk
summary: A native iOS SDK for integrating Tap's Benefit Pay payment solution into your iOS applications.
description: TapBenefitPaySDK is a comprehensive iOS SDK that provides seamless integration with Tap's Benefit Pay payment solution. This SDK offers native UI components, complete payment flow handling, real-time callback support, and full compatibility with both Swift and Objective-C projects. Features include easy setup, built-in Benefit button with official styling, automatic URL scheme handling, and support for iOS 12.0 and later.
